reporting-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre

title.narrative: Shelter food aid for those affected by the floods and food baskets for the most needy families in the Republic of Sudan

description.narrative: 1- Filling the needs of families from the most needy areas by achieving food security and providing non-food bags as well as providing food baskets. 2- Reducing poverty, hunger and the suffering of families affected by the floods, which caused great harm to the targeted families. 3- Assisting families affected by floods and providing livelihoods by providing food baskets and non-food bags.
Providing (3196) bags of non-food items, (60326) food baskets, and (13347) baskets Food to be distributed to those affected by the floods, which caused great damage to the targeted families.

participating-org.narrative: King Salman Humanitarian Aid and Relief Centre
